jei.potionsplus.particle_emitter.descrip: Emits particles in an area around itself when powered by redstone. Interact with an empty hand to cycle through different particles. Interact with a dirt block, iron ingot, gold ingot, or diamond to set the particle spawn rate to 1x (default), 2x, 3x, 4x, respectively.
jei.potionsplus.brewing_cauldron.descrip: Use blaze powder on a vanilla cauldron filled with water to transform it into a brewing cauldron. A heat source must be placed directly beneath in order to brew. The brewing cauldron is the heart of Potions Plus, and allows the player to craft all vanilla brewing stand recipes, in addition to being the exclusive way to craft Potions Plus potions. Recipes for all these potions are randomized per world. The Herbalist's Lectern, Abyssal Trove, and Sanguine Altar provide essential functions for deducing these recipes.
jei.potionsplus.herbalists_lectern.descr: The Herbalist's Lectern is a block that can provide information about an inserted item's usage in brewing cauldron recipes.
jei.potionsplus.sanguine_altar.descripti: The Sanguine Altar will show the player another brewing cauldron ingredient of the same tier as the inserted ingredient. Missing an ingredient in the Trove? The Sanguine Altar will help identify it. Be warned, the Sanguine Altar hungers for blood and consumes all items it takes, permanently.
jei.potionsplus.abyssal_trove.descriptio: The Abyssal Trove is an indispensable tool in any alchemist's journey. It holds the information of all known potion brewing ingredients. This block is purely informational, but one that a young brewer will surely rely on to unearth the secrets of potion-making.
jei.potionsplus.geode_grace.description: When a player kills an experience-dropping mob that has Geode Grace, there is a 3% chance to replace nearby stone with a random ore.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.fall_of_the: Potion of Fall of the Void
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.fall: Splash Potion of Fall of the Void
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.f: Lingering Potion of Fall of the Void
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.fall_: Arrow of Fall of the Void
jei.potionsplus.fall_of_the_void.descrip: Any entity that falls into the void below the world will be teleported to the top of the world. The effect is cleared upon activation.
jei.potionsplus.exploding.description: Mobs with this effect will explode shortly. Players with this effect will explode shortly, without breaking blocks, and accelerate dramatically in the direction they are looking.
jei.potionsplus.magnetic.description: Nearby items are pulled towards mobs with the magnetic effect.
jei.potionsplus.teleportation.descriptio: Randomly teleports the afflicted mob to a nearby location.
jei.potionsplus.looting.description: Adds to the effective looting level. Stacks with the Looting enchantment.
jei.potionsplus.fortuitous_fate.descript: Adds to the effective fortune level. Stacks with the Fortune enchantment.
jei.potionsplus.metal_detecting.descript: Pings nearby ores. The higher the level, the more frequent the pings, and the greater the range. Detects copper, iron, gold, and ancient debris.
jei.potionsplus.giant_steps.description: Increases the afflicted mob's step height.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.reach_for_t: Potion of Reach for the Stars
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.reac: Splash Potion of Reach for the Stars
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.r: Lingering Potion of Reach for the Stars
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.reach: Arrow of Reach for the Stars
jei.potionsplus.reach_for_the_stars.desc: Increases the afflicted mob's jump height.
jei.potionsplus.nautical_nitro.descripti: Afflicted mobs controlling boats receive a +20% speed boost per level.
jei.potionsplus.crop_collector.descripti: Afflicted mobs will automatically nearby crops. Higher levels increase the range and speed of collection.
jei.potionsplus.botanical_boost.descript: Afflicted mobs will automatically grow nearby crops. Higher levels increase the range and speed of growth.
chat.potionsplus.acquired_ingredient_kno: You tingle with alchemical knowledge of the %s you possess...
The %s you possess reminds you of something wet and warm...
The %s you possess fills you with alchemical determination.
tooltip.potionsplus.ingredient: This ingredient seems befitting of a trove...
chat.potionsplus.brewing_cauldron_recipe: You have discovered the recipe for %s!
